original: Brodin, Greta Marie-Louise, leg. läkare, Göteborg, f. 19/2/07 i Gbg av sjökapt. Franz Albin B. o. Gerda Nilsson. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs gymn. f. fl. 27, med. kand. i Lund 31, med. lic. där 38. Förordn. s. tf. und :läk. å Spenshults san. 39, å Sahlgr. sjukh. med. avd. H 39, 41, tf. und:läk. å Gbgs barnsjukh. kir. avd., å Flens-burgska vårdanst. i Malmö 40, s. tf. und :läk. å Vasa sjukh. i Gbg 40-41, tf. und:läk. o. assist :läk. å Gbgs barnsjukh. med. avd. 40, 42, tf. und:läk. å Renström’ska sjukh. i Gbg 42, tf. und :läk. å Sahlgr. sjukh. psyk. avd. 43. Priv. praktik i Gbg fr. 43.
translated: Brodin, Greta Marie-Louise, registered physician, Gothenburg, born on February 19, 1907 in Gothenburg to sea captain Franz Albin B. and Gerda Nilsson. She graduated from Gothenburg Gymnasium in 1927 and earned a Bachelor of Medicine degree in Lund in 1931, followed by a medical license in the same city in 1938. She was appointed as temporary deputy physician at Spenshults Sanatorium in 1939, at Sahlgrren's Hospital Medical Department in 1939 and 1941, as deputy physician at Gothenburg Children's Hospital Surgical Department, at Flensburg Care Facility in Malmö in 1940, as temporary deputy physician at Vasa Hospital in Gothenburg from 1940 to 1941, as deputy physician and assistant physician at Gothenburg Children's Hospital Medical Department in 1940 and 1942, as temporary deputy physician at Renström Hospital in Gothenburg in 1942, and as temporary deputy physician at Sahlgrren's Hospital Psychiatric Department in 1943. She has been in private practice in Gothenburg since 1943.

education.name: Stud:ex. v. Gbgs gymn. f. fl.
